input: Create a complex batch request to include contracts for UUIDs 77889900-bbcc-ddee-ff11-223344556677 and 66778899-aabb-ccdd-eeff-112233445566 with full details and specific focus on the system administrative data.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/77889900-bbcc-ddee-ff11-223344556677?$select=BankCardContractUUID,ID,CurrencyCode,PaymentCardTypeCode,PaymentCardTypeName,PaymentCardID,PaymentCardSequenceID,PaymentCardValidFrom,PaymentCardValidTo,PaymentCardCharacterCode,PaymentCardCharacterName,FirstPaymentCardUUID,AdditionalPaymentCardIndicator,PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusCode,PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusName,PaymentCardRenewalStatusCode,PaymentCardRenewalStatusName,CancellationDate,BankAccount,UsageNote,SystemAdministrativeData,CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements,ProductControl,OperationalBankContractManagement,BusinessProcessChainAssignment,ChangeStateID HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/66778899-aabb-ccdd-eeff-112233445566?$select=BankCardContractUUID,ID,CurrencyCode,PaymentCardTypeCode,PaymentCardTypeName,PaymentCardID,PaymentCardSequenceID,PaymentCardValidFrom,PaymentCardValidTo,PaymentCardCharacterCode,PaymentCardCharacterName,FirstPaymentCardUUID,AdditionalPaymentCardIndicator,PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusCode,PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusName,PaymentCardRenewalStatusCode,PaymentCardRenewalStatusName,CancellationDate,BankAccount,UsageNote,SystemAdministrativeData,CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements,ProductControl,OperationalBankContractManagement,BusinessProcessChainAssignment,ChangeStateID HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
